pages.text: A mystical tool for Blood Altar construction. The Altar Diviner helps you build Blood Magic altars by showing missing components and assisting with placement.

pages.title: Usage
pages.text: $(bold)Divine Structure:$()$(br)Right-click a Blood Altar to scan its structure and identify missing or obstructed components.$(br2)$(bold)Place Phantom Blocks:$()$(br)Sneak + right-click to place phantom blocks showing where components should go.$(br2)$(bold)Quick Build:$()$(br)Right-click with required components in your inventory to automatically place them in the correct positions.

pages.title: Features
pages.text: The Altar Diviner will:$(li)Show missing components in chat$(li)Highlight obstructed positions$(li)Create visual guides$(li)Assist with tier upgrades$(li)Speed up altar construction$(br2)Essential for building higher tier altars!$(br2)$(italic)Divine the perfect structure.$()
